actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

official_title: To designate certain National Park System land in Olympic National Park as wilderness or potential wilderness, and for other purposes.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Designates specified federal land within Olympic National Park, Washington, as wilderness or potential wilderness. Incorporates such land in the Olympic Wilderness.

titles.title: To designate certain National Park System land in Olympic National Park as wilderness or potential wilderness, and for other purposes.
